alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 1:35PM MDT until March 16 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips and Southwest Phillips Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight MDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast to north winds will create deep drifts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Southwest Phillips
